title: ROCKSTAR SHELVES TWO GAMES? NEW ROBOCOP GAMEPLAY, & MORE
description:
Sponsored by Magic Spoon. Use my code GAMERANX to get $5 off your delicious, healthy Magic Spoon cereal by clicking this link: https://magicspoon.thld.co/gameranx_0722

Rumors suggest Rockstar Games is bailing on remasteres/remakes, God of War Rangarok gets a release date, and more in a week full of gaming news.

title: PS5 PRO: 8 Things We DON'T WANT
description:
The PS5 Pro won't be a thing anytime soon, but however Sony decides to update the PS5, we've got a list of some things we don't want from it.
Subscribe for more: https://www.youtube.com/gameranxTV?sub_confirmation=1
